name: wan 2.5 Text to Video Generator Kie AI
description:
Tool for generating a video from text using the wan/2-5-text-to-video model via the kie.ai API.
Pricing (as of November 2025): ~$0.06 per second for 720p, ~$0.10 per second for 1080p.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai/
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: The API key for authenticating with the kie.ai API

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 420 (equal 7 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 10

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the video (16:9, 9:16, or 1:1). Default: 16:9

negative_prompt.description: Optional negative prompt to avoid in video generation. Default: None. Max length: 500 characters

resolution.description: The resolution of the video (720p or 1080p). Default: 720p

duration.description: The duration of the video in seconds (5 or 10). Default: 5

seed.description: Optional seed for reproducible generation (integer). Default None, a random seed is chosen.

filename.description: Optional filename for the saved video (without extension). Default: None (uses the task_id as filename)

prompt.description: The text prompt describing the video to generate. Max length : 800 characters.

enable_prompt_expansion.description: Whether to enable prompt expansion for better results (useful for short prompts, but longer processing time). Default: false.

local_path.description: Local path where the video is saved

task_id.description: The task ID of the generation job

video_urls.description: List of video URLs from the API
